amendment.description: Amendment strikes the local share requirement for Essential Air Service communities less than 75 miles from a small hub or less than 170 miles from a medium or large hub.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 108-146,to strike the local share requirement for Essential Air Service communities less than 75 miles from a small hub or less than 170 miles from a medium or large hub.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peterson (PA) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Peterson (PA).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Peterson (PA) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
